channel.title: Dashboards on DefectDojo Documentation

item.title: DefectDojo Main Dashboard
item.description: The Dashboard is likely the first page you’ll see when you open DefectDojo. It summarizes your teamâ€™s performance, and provides tracking tools to monitor specific areas of your vulnerability tracking environment.

item.title: Custom Dashboard Tiles
item.description: Dashboard Tiles are customizable sets of filters for your DefectDojo instance, which can be added to your ðŸ  Home dashboard. Tiles are designed to provide relevant information and speed up navigation within DefectDojo.

item.title: Metrics Dashboards (Pro)
item.description: The DefectDojo Pro UI has many Metrics dashboards which are kept up to date in real-time. Each Dashboard can render a PDF report to share data with key stakeholders.
